data_description.broadcast_address: The IP address of the host to send the magic packet to. Defaults to `255.255.255.255` and is normally not changed.
data_description.broadcast_port: The port to send the magic packet to. Defaults to `9` and is normally not changed.
data_description.mac: MAC address of the device to wake up.

send_magic_packet.description: Sends a 'magic packet' to wake up a device with 'Wake-On-LAN' capabilities.
send_magic_packet.name: Send magic packet
